description: This is a Flutter widget source file defining a landing page with UI components such as header, feature cards, and navigation buttons.

classes.name: LandingPage
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the main landing page, including header, feature overview, and navigation options.

classes.name: _FeatureCard
classes.description: A stateless widget displaying individual feature information with icon, title, and subtitle.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the LandingPage and _FeatureCard widgets.
